item.title: Charli XCX’s “Trophy” is also featured in the film’s trailer.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Charli XCX composed the score for Emma Seligman’s ‘BOTTOMS’ alongside Leo Birenberg.
The film stars Ayo Edebiri and Rachel Sennott. It will be released in theaters on August 25, 2023.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: ‘PERRY MASON’ has been canceled by HBO after two seasons.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: ‘Avatar: The Way of Water’ is now streaming on Disney+
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: Melissa McCarthy has expressed her interest in a sequel to her hit 2015 comedy ‘SPY’.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Ridley Scott’s ‘GLADIATOR 2’ begins filming this month.
Starring Paul Mescal, Denzel Washington, Pedro Pascal, Fred Hechinger, May Calamawy, and Joseph Quinn.
item.author: FilmUpdates
